name: clean-slate
description: CleanSlate is a self-hosted app designed for habit tracking and lifestyle improvement. It allows users to log daily routines, visualize progress, and set goals for habit formation via an intuitive web interface.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Log daily routines and habits. Build consistency

features.title: Progress Visualization
features.description: See your habit streaks and progress. Stay motivated

features.title: Goal Setting
features.description: Set and track lifestyle improvement goals. Achieve more

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Easy-to-use web UI for daily logging. Minimal friction

features.title: Lifestyle Improvement
features.description: Focus on building better habits. Personal growth

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your habit data completely private. Personal journey
